subscriptionPlans.name: Daily Plan
features: Two meals (any two of the day)
Best for trials or short-term needs

subscriptionPlans.name: Monthly Plan
features: Fully personalized meals based on preferences

instantMeals.name: Rajma Chawal Combo
instantMeals.description: A comforting, home-cooked plate of kidney beans curry served with basmati rice.

instantMeals.name: Homestyle Veg Thali
instantMeals.description: A complete meal: two vegetable curries, dal, rice, 3 rotis, and a small fresh salad.

instantMeals.name: Palak Paneer & Roti
instantMeals.description: Fresh paneer in a classic spinach curry, served with 4 whole wheat rotis.

instantMeals.name: Chole Bhature
instantMeals.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fluffy deep-fried bread, accompanied by pickled onions and green chutney.

instantMeals.name: Dal Makhani with Jeera Rice
instantMeals.description: Creamy black lentils slow-cooked with butter and cream, served with aromatic cumin rice.

instantMeals.name: Aloo Paratha with Pickle & Curd
instantMeals.description: Stuffed potato flatbread pan-fried to perfection, served with tangy pickle and fresh curd.

instantMeals.name: Vegetable Biryani
instantMeals.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with aromatic spices, mixed vegetables, and served with raita.

instantMeals.name: Dosa with Sambar & Chutney
instantMeals.description: Crispy South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentils, served with lentil sambar and coconut chutney.

instantMeals.name: Creamy Tomato Pasta
instantMeals.description: Homemade pasta in a rich, creamy tomato sauce with fresh herbs, topped with parmesan cheese.

instantMeals.name: Alfredo Pasta
instantMeals.description: Creamy white sauce pasta with garlic, butter, and parmesan cheese, garnished with fresh parsley.

instantMeals.name: Veg Manchurian
instantMeals.description: Crispy vegetable balls in a tangy, spicy Manchurian sauce, served with fried rice or noodles.

instantMeals.name: Hakka Noodles
instantMeals.description: Stir-fried noodles with mixed vegetables, tossed in a savory sauce with aromatic spices.

instantMeals.name: Samosa Chaat
instantMeals.description: Crispy samosas topped with tangy chutneys, yogurt, onions, and sev - a perfect street food delight.

instantMeals.name: Pav Bhaji
instantMeals.description: Spiced vegetable curry served with butter-toasted bread rolls, garnished with fresh coriander and onions.

instantMeals.name: Dal Tadka with Jeera Rice
instantMeals.description: Tempered yellow lentils cooked with spices, served with aromatic cumin rice and pickle.

instantMeals.name: Gobi Paratha with Butter
instantMeals.description: Stuffed cauliflower flatbread pan-fried with butter, served with pickle, yogurt, and butter.
